column1:
Duq,"2011-01-11T18:42:22.407Z","Little green monster","

I'm no fan of monster trucks and I only really picked up this set because I had already got the other three in the series.

Building it was a pleasant surprise. There are some red 1x1 round plates to represent the suspension, there are the new 1x3 tiles in lime green at the back and it's got two spot lights in front. Overall it just looks pretty good.

I made a small change though
column2:
I think the lights are way too low, so I swapped the 1x2 plate with door rail with the 1x2 plate with handle (holding the lights).

My only disappointment really is that the engine is dark grey, not matt or chrome silver.

All in all a pretty good Tiny Turbo.

",TRUE,4,4,3,3,4

column5: It took me 2 minuts to build and 2 minuts to put the stickers on. The truck is high of the ground. I put 2 transparant red bricks in the back for brake lights.

column2: As shown here. The stickers weren't that hard to put on.&nbsp
